'''Keepsake Photo of Twilight Theater''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Keepsake Photo of Twilight Theater is obtained after completing the quest [[Drama Phantasmagoria: Tale of the Sword-Wielding Princess!]].
